plot: As interest grows in the psychoactive visionary brew Ayahuasca (the Mother of all 'teacher plants') so does the question of how to explain this mysterious phenomenon to the uninitiated ...
title: The Shaman & Ayahuasca: Journeys to Sacred Realms
